value.name: Lichess Broadcasts
value.description:
Join this team to stay informed on Lichess broadcasts. We will be sending out weekly PMs about upcoming events.


The broadcasts schedule appear here: lichess.org/broadcast. Additional events may be added during the week, and you can always stay updated here

If you want to ask a specific event to be broadcasted or you have created  a broadcast (more info: lichess.org/page/broadcasts ) and you want to request to be featured, please send an email to broadcast@lichess.org - requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.

value.name: Lichess Curator
value.description:
Join the team to stay informed on Lichess events. We'll send out a weekly personal message about upcoming events.

Organizers / Streamers - please send a Lichess message to [curator](https://lichess.org/@/curator) to tell us about your event!

value.name: Lichess Three-check
value.description:
## **Welcome to the Official Three-check Team!**

We are the home of [Three-check](https://lichess.org/variant/threeCheck) fans across Lichess! Join us and become a part of the best variant team! All team members can play in community three-check tournaments/events, collaborate on studies, solve puzzles, and more!

# **Upcoming events** 


# **Helpful Resources!**
- [Puzzles by pellepou](https://lichess.org/study/luFEMTIO) can be found on [chessvariants](https://chessvariants.training/Puzzle)
- [Opening Theory by Chess_Poems](https://lichess.org/study/qqGptMt8)
- [Interactive Lesson by WallaceTwo](https://lichess.org/study/j1rszQuk) on three-check principles 


# **Check out the [Three-check World Championship Team](https://lichess.org/team/3-world-championship)**:
- Insightful studies on the [2021](https://lichess.org/study/FZd2odOK/3KAFpjAI) and [2022](https://lichess.org/study/jZhh2rVR/ZunpoAV4) grand finals by [TCF_Namelecc](https://lichess.org/@/TCF_Namelecc)
- Great [broadcast coverage](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4QsM32iwIkk&ab_channel=TheChess_PoemsChessChannel) by [Chess_Poems](https://lichess.org/@/Chess_Poems)
Current World Champion: UnholyCrusade 2024

# **Top Three-check Players**
- [Live rankings](https://lichess.org/player/top/200/threeCheck)
- [Most tournament points](https://lichess.thijs.com/rankings/3check/all/list_players_points.html)

**Share your work [here](https://lichess.org/forum/team-lichess-three-check/share-your-ideas) to be featured on this page!**

---

# **Game of the Week (04/25–05/01): Determined David**
[ArianRahimpour (2248) vs. Radio-Scacchi (1972) - (1-0)](https://lichess.org/zr2xPeOb)

![Game of the Week](https://i.imgur.com/J5LNn7z.gif)


- See past Games of the Week [here](https://lichess.org/study/yCC6S8A6/SgaZuYdE)
- **Private message [FlamoToolz](https://lichess.org/@/FlamoToolz) so your game can be featured here!**

---

**Other Lichess official variant teams**
[Chess960](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-chess960) • [King of the Hill](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-king-of-the-hill) • [Antichess](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-antichess) • [Atomic](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-atomic) • [Horde](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-horde) • [Racing Kings](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-racing-kings) • [Crazyhouse](https://lichess.org/team/lichess-crazyhouse)

value.name: Vegan Players
value.description:
![Pigs watching](https://i.imgur.com/RYC0Yzr.jpeg)
**_"Men are the devils of the earth, and the animals are the tormented souls."_**  
― *Arthur Schopenhauer*

### https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UcN7SGGoCNI


## Welcome to Vegan Players!

We are a Lichess team for vegans and **anyone curious about learning more about veganism**. Join us for discussions on compassionate living and participate in team battles!

![Vegan definition image](https://imgur.com/lyEfGd3.png)

Source: [The Vegan Society](https://www.vegansociety.com/go-vegan/definition-veganism)

## Learn More About Veganism

### As vegan don't forget to take vitamin B12 (absolutely necessary), and look into other things like vitamin D and other supplements. A whole-food plant-based diet is one of the healthiest, if not the healthiest diet. Potential sites to look for vegan nutritional information:
https://veganhealth.org/
https://nutritionfacts.org/ (sometimes regarded as mixed or false in accuracy, particularly with oils)

- [Earthling Ed - You Will Never Look at Your Life the Same Way Again](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z3u7hXpOm58) [32:22]
- [Dominion Documentary](https://watchdominion.org/) [2:00:00]
  Trigger Warning: Contains graphic footage of animal cruelty. Viewer discretion advised.



If you have any questions or want to learn more about veganism, feel free to message @FiveKnights.

![Drawing of man with dog surrounded by deceased animals](https://i.imgur.com/LNCFfxU.jpeg)

profile.bio: Sargon-2ply is a re-implementation of Dan and Kathe Spracklen's 1978 SARGON commercial chess engine. It uses a 2-ply full search with material exchange, king/queen pins and "board control" heuristics. Too hard? Try @sargon-1ply or @bernstein-2ply. Too easy? Try @sargon-3ply or @turochamp-2ply. Author: @herohde

AcceptPgnOrJson.name: Accept
AcceptPgnOrJson.description:
Specify the desired response format.
Use `application/x-chess-pgn` to get the games in PGN format.
Use `application/json` to get the games in JSON format.

AcceptPgnOrNdjson.name: Accept
AcceptPgnOrNdjson.description:
Specify the desired response format.
Use `application/x-chess-pgn` to get the games in PGN format.
Use `application/x-ndjson` to get the games in ndjson format. [Read about ndjson here](#description/streaming-with-nd-json) and how you can parse it in Javascript.
